Title: Tears in the Vale
Description:
As N'Zoth's influence spreads within the Vale, our very reality begins to break down. 

The Old God's power has created tears in the fabric our world, acting as doorways for his minions to invade from his dark realm.

As long as these tears exist, we will never be free from N'Zoth's grasp. Close them, and stem the tide of his corruption!
ObjectivesText: Close 3 Void Tears within the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
